article_title: SOS building found near where hostages were shot - IDF.
sentence: SOS  building  found  near  where  hostages  were  shot  -  IDF.

article_title: SOS building found near where hostages were shot - IDF.
sentence: The  IDF  official  says  hundreds  of  metres  from  where  the  three  hostages  were  mistakenly  killed,  there  was  a  building  with  "SOS"  marked  on  it.
